content: Hi all, i am having an issue with connecting IBM/FHIR project to an external keycloak auth server to validate access tokens which are generated by the external keycloak server. I just enabled oauth in fhir-server-config.json file and set the auth server endpoints but i am not sure which files should i modify to connect the keycloak server from the IBM/FHIR project. Is there any documentation, blog post etc. about it or can somebody guide me about the issue? Thanks for your support!
sorry for the wrong stream. how can i delete or close the message from here?
You can edit a post to just say 'deleted', but in general fine to just abandon the thread (or better yet, note where the conversation has moved to)
